003892BF.desc: Damaging enemies with One-Handed Weapons increases your Critical Strike chance by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|x%|]{/c} for {c_number}{SF_2}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_0}*{SF_1}*100|x%|]{/c}. This can only happen once per Skill cast, or twice per second while channeling {c_important}Whirlwind{/c}.

7786FD97.Buff1_Description: You have {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%|]{/c} increased Critical Strike Chance per stack.
